analysis.description:
Reentrancy in UpgradeableToken.upgrade (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb49a51ee5a66ca3a8cbe529379ba44ba67e6771.sol#516-534):
	External calls:
	- upgradeAgent.upgradeFrom(msg.sender,value) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb49a51ee5a66ca3a8cbe529379ba44ba67e6771.sol#527-528)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalUpgraded (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb49a51ee5a66ca3a8cbe529379ba44ba67e6771.sol#532-533)

LostAndFoundToken.enableLostAndFound (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb49a51ee5a66ca3a8cbe529379ba44ba67e6771.sol#620-631) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_contract.approve(agent,tokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb49a51ee5a66ca3a8cbe529379ba44ba67e6771.sol#630-631)

CrowdsaleToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb49a51ee5a66ca3a8cbe529379ba44ba67e6771.sol#709)
CrowdsaleToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb49a51ee5a66ca3a8cbe529379ba44ba67e6771.sol#709)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xbb49a51ee5a66ca3a8cbe529379ba44ba67e6771.sol#440)
